description.originalText: Maya is wonderful. Our daughter absolutely loves her and she has our full trust. We feel lucky to have her!

description.displayText: Maya is amazing and we can't recommend her highly enough. She quickly made great friends with our kids, we'd work with her again in a heartbeat.
description.originalText: Maya is amazing and we can't recommend her highly enough. She quickly made great friends with our kids, we'd work with her again in a heartbeat.

description.displayText: I'm not one for reviews but I hired Maya as a sitter to see how I would feel having my son with someone else. She made the process totally comfortable with the constant reassurance and warm personality. She was easy to talk to and willing to listen to how I raise my son instead of forcing her beliefs on me. The weekend she had him she sent me pictures and let me know to feel free to text or call anytime. What more do you want from a sitter? Oh! She was keen on asking about allergies and anything that may trigger or harm the child. Someone who ensures that they know everything about my child will definitely be hired by me again.

description.displayText:
Maya started babysitting for us in 2018. She was nurturing & patient with our daughter & truly grew to be a part of our family. Maya was very flexible with hours, was never late & always had educational activities for our daughter to do. She followed a strict eating & nap schedule to the T. All in all she loved my daughter like she was her own. 

When my son was born, she started babysitting them both on a regular basis. Maya did an excellent job getting the kids on a stable routine. She did light cooking, light cleaning, bath time & took the kids for walks and to the park. I was most impressed with how well she balanced 2 children under 2 years old. She never skipped a beat. I highly recommend Maya for any nanny or baby sitting opportunity. She's truly a gem.

description.displayText: Maya has been watching my son for several years now. At this point he sees her more like a big sister than a babysitter. She's warm, friendly, and it's clear she loves kids. She's also great about communication and I never have to worry about being out of the loop on anything. I can't recommend her highly enough.

She's also great about communication and I never have to worry about being out of the loop on anything. I can't recommend her highly enough.

description.displayText:
Maya was my student teacher during the 2015 school year. During this period I find her to be a very bright, pleasant, and uplifting individual. She was very dedicated toward achieving the task at  hand. I found her to work exceedingly well with the children. She is a team player who doesn't mind going above and beyond her necessary duties!
If you need any other information feel free to  contact me through  my email.
